original_text: their twenty pillars and their twenty bases were of bronze, but the hooks of the pillars and their fillets were of silver.
korean_text: 그 기둥이 스물이며 그 받침이 스물이니 놋이요 기둥의 갈고리와 가름대는 은이며

sentences.original_text: Their twenty pillars were of bronze
and their twenty bases were of bronze
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들의 스무 개 받침도 놋이었다

sentences.original_text: but the hooks of the pillars were of silver
and their fillets were of silver
